titles: Nicodemus for Christ, or The religious moote of an honest lawyer: deliuered in a sermon, preached at the assises at Okeham, in the county of Rutland, March. 10. 1627. By Antony Favvkner, Master of Arts, and late student in Iesus Colledge in Oxford
author: Fawkner, Antony, b. 1601 or 2.
publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston for Robert Allott, and are to be sold at his shop in S. Pauls Churchyard at the signe of the Beare,
